response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than its face value. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, we are offering it at an introductory price of $1,200,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
